Edit.Name: prpOrientationCruise
Edit.Caption: Cruise orientation
Edit.Help: Determines how the screen is rotated with the glider

Edit.Name: prpOrientationCircling
Edit.Caption: Circling orientation
Edit.Help: Determines how the screen is rotated with the glider while circling

Edit.Name: prpCirclingZoom
Edit.Caption: Circling zoom
Edit.Help: If enabled, then the map will zoom in automatically when entering circling mode and zoom out automatically when leaving circling mode.

Edit.Name: prpMapShiftBias
Edit.Caption: Map shift reference
Edit.Help: Determines what is used to shift the glider from the map center

Edit.Name: prpGliderScreenPosition
Edit.Caption: Glider position offset
Edit.Help: Defines the location of the glider drawn on the screen in percent from the screen edge.

Edit.Name: prpMaxAutoZoomDistance
Edit.Caption: Max. auto zoom distance
Edit.Help: The upper limit for auto zoom distance.
